site_name: 99-101, 103/107, 117 And 109-119 Waterloo Road And 124-126 Cornwall Road, London, SE1 8UL
description: Demolition of 99-101 Waterloo Road, 103-107 Waterloo Road, 124 and 126 Cornwall Road and redevelopment for a new office building (Class E g) and flexible ancillary uses (Class E a, b) together with the refurbishment of 109-119 Waterloo Road (Mercury House) for Class E a, b, and g uses, and works to the public highway, public realm, new landscaping, ancillary and enabling works, plant and equipment.
